# utils.cls_typechecked { #caml.utils.cls_typechecked }

`utils.cls_typechecked(cls)`

Class decorator to typecheck all methods of a class.

## Parameters

| Name   | Type   | Description            | Default    |
|--------|--------|------------------------|------------|
| `cls`  |        | The class to decorate. | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type                      | Description   |
|---------------------------|---------------|
| cls: The decorated class. |               |
